column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////2) Almond Croissant: In general
column2: almond croissants are magical to me
column3: and the ones at Common Bond are no exception. The perfectly crisped
column4: buttery exterior is the best partner for the sweet almond filling. $4.50 is a little steep
column5: but it's a good way to treat yourself.
